effect.black_white: For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage. Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect. This effect is removed by gravity. If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage. Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect. This effect is removed by gravity. If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.

flavor_text.black_white: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
